## Documentation Issue Summary
A clear description of the documentation problem or improvement needed.

## Issue Type
What kind of documentation issue is this?
- [ ] **Missing documentation** (feature exists but undocumented)
- [ ] **Incorrect documentation** (docs don't match actual behavior)
- [ ] **Outdated documentation** (docs are out of sync with current version)
- [ ] **Unclear documentation** (confusing or hard to understand)
- [ ] **Broken links/examples** (links don't work or code examples fail)
- [ ] **Documentation request** (new content needed)
- [ ] **Typo/Grammar** (spelling or grammar errors)

## Location
Where is the documentation issue located?
- [ ] **README files** (main README or component READMEs)
- [ ] **API documentation** (rustdoc, docstrings)
- [ ] **User guides** (tutorials, getting started guides)
- [ ] **Developer documentation** (contribution guide, architecture docs)
- [ ] **Examples** (code examples in examples/ directory)
- [ ] **Migration guides** (framework migration documentation)
- [ ] **Performance guides** (optimization and tuning documentation)
- [ ] **Deployment guides** (production deployment documentation)
- [ ] **Website/GitHub Pages** (online documentation site)

**Specific file(s) or URL(s)**:
- File: [e.g. `docs/getting_started.md`, `trustformers-core/README.md`]
- URL: [e.g. https://docs.trustformers.ai/guide/quickstart]
- Line numbers: [if applicable]
